casebody.data:
MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0537. State ex rel. Shanks v. Columbus Dept. of Pub. Safety, Division of Fire.

In Mandamus. On motion to dismiss. Sua sponte, an alternative writ is granted and the following briefing schedule is set for presentation of evidence and filing of briefs pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. X:

The parties shall file any evidence they intend to present within 20 days of the date of this entry; relator shall file its brief within ten days of the filing of evidence; respondent shall file its brief within 20 days after the filing of relator’s brief; and relator may file a reply brief within seven days after the filing of respondent’s brief.
